Commentary.ab: VrS18.3a †āsiiaiiā̊ ... †taxmō.tąšiiaiiā̊] sec. cod.; Geldner, Kellens āsiiā̊ ... taxmō.tąšiiā̊, sec. 2000 [K7b] (āsiiā̊, but corr. sec. man. āsiiaiiā̊) and 4260 [P1] (taxmō.tąšiiā̊). Kellens, 2010 p.22 "masculins incongrus". Irregular forms. Expected *āsiiehi and taxmō.tąšiiehi. Likely corrupted with the following yā, i.e. *āsiiehi yā to āsiiaiiā̊ yā and *taxmō.tąšiiehi yā to taxmō.tąšiiaiiā̊ yā.
